data.title: Great Pizza and many choices
data.text: Great Pizza love how they create different pizza topping "unique" and the different sauces make it an adventure. Fast friendly staff and decent prices. Stop by and give it a try.

data.title: ***MUST READ***
data.text: Ok first of all i really love the staff they were awesome but the pizza i got was cold and very old tasting when i notified the staff they got on it right away and got me the freshest pizza ever i love the staff here overall i would return and you should give it a try yourself so enjoy

data.title: Great Selection
data.text: If you are a vegetarian (like one in our party was) they have alot to choose from. My friend had the tofu with spicey veggies. I tried it and it was delish.

data.title: Don't get excited!
data.text: All day breakfast menu with many Chinese dishes. Soups are generally luke warm only, otherwise food is OK and reasonably priced. Setting is pleasant (indoors and on indoor terrace), service could be a bit more friendly.
